Projects

Some r-pi projects

Web Filter Proxy & parental control

Turn a Raspberry Pi into a advanced and highly configurable web filter and parental control proxy with Privoxy, Squid and SquidGuard

Wireless Access Point & Transparent Squid/SquidGuard

Turn a Raspberry Pi into a wireless access point with transparent Squid and SquidGuard proxy

Backup with rsnapshot

Backup multiple r-pi on an external USB drive with rsnapshot

Virtual Private Network

Turn a Raspberry Pi into a VPN server

Web server (under construction)

Turn a Raspberry Pi into a Web server

Nextcloud (under construction)

Turn a Raspberry Pi into a fully File Access and sync platform
